about.title: About Our Sunday School
about.description: Ankese Birhan Senbet Sunday School is dedicated to nurturing the spiritual and intellectual growth of our children and youth in the light of the Ethiopian Orthodox Tewahedo Church.
about.missionDesc: To preserve and transmit the holy tradition, dogmas, and values of the EOTC to the next generation through comprehensive education and active participation in church life.
about.visionDesc: A vibrant community of believers who are deeply rooted in their faith, spiritually enlightened, and committed to serving God and humanity.
